question:
【已评审】redfish指定机箱资源信息增属性 - content: ISSUE链接（必填，此议题关联的issue）：【需求】SMM板 Redfish接口在指定机箱资源信息增属性HMMToGWLinkStateCheckingEnabled，支持检测链路是否和网关通信正常的开关
背景:
现网使用SmartKit巡检时发现SMM备用板无法Ping通，更换交换机的光电转换模块后正常，SMM2需要主动检测到对端路径链路的状态，异常时上报告警，正常后恢复告警。同时北向redfish接口增加属性开关使能和禁用此特性。
决策点：
URI: /redfish/v1/Chassis/Enclosure
新增属性：Oem/{OemIdentifier}/新增属性HMMToGWLinkStateCheckingEnabled
涉及方法：GET、PATCH
详细方案：
image1308×667 35.8 KB
错误码：400
错误引擎如下：
“HMMToGWLinkStateCheckingEnabledModificationFailed”: {
“Description”: “Indicates that the gateway detection modification failed when the IP mode is set to automatic, the gateway is empty, and the static IP address is empty.”,
“Message”: “The attribute %1 modification failed. Possible causes are that the IP mode is automatic, the gateway or static IP address is empty, or the attribute CheckGEMgmtGWCommState is not supported.”,
“Severity”: “Warning”,
“NumberOfArgs”: 1,
“ParamTypes”: [
“string”
],
“Resolution”: “Setting the IP mode is manual configuration, gateway, static IP address.”
}
评审结论:
openUBMC社区暂不涉及此类场景，因此暂不在社区增加该redfish message
links: https://gitcode.com/openUBMC/bingo/issues/13, https://discuss.openubmc.cn/uploads/default/original/1X/e4ad1007e710280b76c5a4f4e99ac7dd1e6c7f86.png
